import {useState,useS} from "react" import axios from 'axios'; const InitialScreen = () => { // Componet logic const [films, setFilms] = React.useState([]); React.useEffect(() => { const promise = axios.get("https://mock-api.driven.com.br/api/v5/cineflex/movies"); promise.then((response) => setFilms(response.data)) promise.catch(console.log("error")) }, []); console.log(films.id); // Component UI return (

Selecione o filme

); } export default InitialScreen
